name: SpaceQuiz
0:
”Alexa start Space Quiz”
”Alexa tell Space Quiz to start normal quiz”
”Alexa tell Space Quiz to start hard quiz”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: space quiz
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to the ultimate space quiz! This quiz has three levels of difficulty: easy, normal, and hard, with over 70 questions to test your space knowledge. Whether you're a space enthusiast or just looking to brush up on your facts, this quiz is perfect for you. And best of all, it's fully touch-screen compatible, making it easy to use and navigate. Let's get started and see how much you know about the final frontier!

To get started simply say: Alexa start Space Quiz
Alexa tell Space Quiz to start normal quiz
Alexa tell Space Quiz to start hard quiz

Quiz only accepts A, B, C, D, E as valid answers.
Say: help, to hear and see some pointers
Say: Start over, to restart the skill.
Say: Repeat, to hear previous response.
